inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of persistent or permanent atrial fibrillation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: meet ACC/HRS guidelines for atrioventricular nodal ablation procedure
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: be available for at least 1 month post procedure
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: be greater than or equal to 18 years old
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: do not meet ACC/HRS indications for av nodal ablation
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has abdominal pain and vomiting, but no history of allergies or using any medications. His family history is positive for type 2 diabetes.
